short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To tell what is going on in sword fighters. Give a notification when there is new update

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps keep track of the latest version of Sword Fighters and lets you download all older versions if available. There will be announcements soon of things that are being added and other things.
